Package weka.core

Class AttributeStats

java.lang.Object
weka.core.AttributeStats
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RevisionHandler
public class AttributeStats extends Object implements Serializable, RevisionHandler
A Utility class that contains summary information on an the values that appear in a dataset for a particular attribute.
Version:
$Revision: 14911 $
Author:
Len Trigg
